definition: the hottest period of the year/see 三伏天[san1 fu2 tian1]
to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt
surname Fu
day/sky/heaven
three periods forming the hottest periods of summer, from mid-July to mid-August, namely: 初伏 (mid-July), 中伏 (late July to early August), 末伏 (mid-August)

sentences.english: Hot summer days are coming while the high-grade summer goods will raise another heat wave.
sentences.chinese: 伏天将临，夏日精晶将掀起又一个热季狂潮。

sentences.english: Of or relating to the dog days .
sentences.chinese: 三伏天的或与之相关的。

sentences.english: I can do nothing except for swimming during the dog days.
sentences.chinese: 三伏天除了游泳我什么都不能做。

sentences.english: The dog days will arrive soon . We had better install an air conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 三伏天快要来了，我们最好装一个空调。

sentences.english: The dog days will arrive soon . We'd better install an air conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 三伏天就要来了，我们最好装一个空调。

sentences.english: Dog days are the hottest days in summer.
sentences.chinese: 三伏天是夏季最热的时候。

sentences.english: These are the dog days; watermelons are just in season.
sentences.chinese: 现在是伏天，西瓜正当令。

sentences.english: I can do nothing except for swimming in the dog days.
sentences.chinese: 三伏天我除了游泳我什么都不能干。

sentences.english: People like staying at home during the dog days.
sentences.chinese: 在三伏天人们喜欢待在家里。

sentences.english: I can do nothing except for swimming in dog days.
sentences.chinese: 在三伏天，我除了游泳之外什么也干不了。

sentences.english: Method In summer dog days, treat 96 cases with acupoint application.
sentences.chinese: 采用夏季三伏天穴位敷贴96例。

sentences.english: Fat people suffer a lot in the dog days.
sentences.chinese: 身体肥胖的人三伏天就要受苦了。

definition: three periods forming the hottest periods of summer, from mid-July to mid-August, namely: 初伏 (mid-July), 中伏 (late July to early August), 末伏 (mid-August)
three periods forming the hottest periods of summer, from mid-July to mid-August, namely: 初伏 (mid-July), 中伏 (late July to early August), 末伏 (mid-August)
hot (summer) day
Dashu or Great Heat, 12th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd July-6th August
hot summer/scorching summer
hot (summer) weather
hot spell during autumn/Indian summer
Xiaoshu or Lesser Heat, 11th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd July
the twenty seven days after the Winter Solstice, reputed to be the coldest days of the year
(summer) heat
Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August
midsummer/the height of summer
nine periods of nine days each after winter solstice, the coldest time of the year
torrid heat
scorching
Chushu or End of Heat, 14th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd August-7th September
